video_prompt: Young anime woman subtly shifts her weight, a soft sway of her long hair. Her expression flickers, a hint of a smile forming. The background remains plain but might subtly shift to reveal a hint of depth behind her.
image_prompt: Full-length anime-style young woman, eye-level shot, front view, body slightly angled right, head facing viewer. She has long dark brown hair, fair skin, light pink lips, small nose, large light blue eyes with long eyelashes, light blush, and small gold hoop earrings. She wears a white collared shirt (top two buttons open), open black business blazer with three cuff buttons, black mini-skirt, and black pointed-toe high heels. Plain light grey background with a concrete floor. Soft shadow.
refined_video_prompt: A subtle weight shift commences. Long hair gently sways with the movement. An expression flickers, a hint of a smile gradually forming. The plain background concurrently undergoes a subtle alteration, revealing a hint of emerging depth.
